name: Shennong: Taste of Illusion
description: Shennong is a mythical sage ruler of prehistoric China, the God-King of Chinese medicine and agriculture, who tests a hundred varieties of herbs with his holy red whip, tastes them all, encounters seventy poison in one day, knows the properties of all plants and finally catalogs of 365 species of medicinal plants into a book, "Shennong's Classic of Herbal Medicine".
